content:
Certainly! Bacolod is known for its delicious chicken inasal, and there are plenty of places to try it. Here are some popular places to enjoy the best chicken inasal in the city:

1. Aida's Chicken - Aida's Chicken is a well-known spot for chicken inasal, with several branches in Bacolod city. 2. Nena's Beth Chickenhaus - Located near Bacolod's Central Market, Nena's Beth Chickenhaus is another favorite of foodies and locals alike, serving juicy and flavorful chicken inasal. 3. Manokan Country - This food center is a popular spot for locals and tourists looking for authentic Bacolodnon cuisine, including chicken inasal. It has several small stalls offering various versions of the dish. 4. Chicken Deli - This homegrown fast-food chain is a popular choice for Bacolodnon's chicken inasal cravings. It also serves other Filipino dishes. 5. Iggie's Chicken - A relatively new addition to Bacolod's chicken inasal scene, Iggie's Chicken has been garnering positive feedback since its opening. These are just some of the famous places to enjoy chicken inasal in Bacolod. Each place has its unique take on the dish, so it's worth trying as many as possible.
